title: Super Mario 64
brief_description: Being the first 3D Mario game, Super Mario 64 introduced several moves, including triple-jumping, ground-pounding, long-jumping, diving, and somersaulting, which would be used in most subsequent installments of the Super Mario series.

constellations_other.name: Shadow play
constellations_other.description: Shadow play uses light and projection to tell stories â€“ fundamentals that would evolve into cinematography. In the Wayang tradition, gunungan open and close performances and indicate scene changes and the puppets pass across the projection screen in a similar way to a wipe transition.

description: Super Mario 64 is a 3D platformer game released for the Nintendo 64. Being the first 3D Mario game, Super Mario 64 has introduced several moves, including triple-jumping, ground-pounding, long-jumping, diving, and somersaulting, which would be used in most subsequent installments of the Super Mario series. The core gameplay is similar to previous games, focusing on jumping, avoiding obstacles and defeating enemies. Since its release, Super Mario 64 has been widely acclaimed as one of the greatest and most important games of all time.
